results.deck: A HD collection of the first three Splinter Cell games. It is part of Sony's HD Collection series of games.
results.name: Splinter Cell Trilogy

results.deck: A horror game by Guillermo del Toro.
results.name: inSANE

results.deck: Go deeper into the Overlord's twisted world as the single-player expansion content opens a series of hellish new levels.
results.name: Overlord: Raising Hell

results.deck: The second episode of Telltale's new Back to the Future series. After hastily rescuing Doc Brown from 1931 and finding himself fading from history, Marty McFly must correct the timeline and preserve his own future.
results.name: Back to the Future: The Game - Episode 2: Get Tannen!

results.deck: The third episode for Telltales new Back to the Future series. Marty McFly finds himself trapped in an alternate 1986 Hill Valley ruled under the watchful eye of First Citizen Brown.
results.name: Back to the Future: The Game - Episode 3: Citizen Brown

results.deck: The fourth episode for Telltale's new Back to the Future series.  It's time for the Hill Valley Expo! Back in 1986, Marty and First Citizen Brown must join forces to create an epic invention so that he can prevent the young Emmett Brown from making the worst mistake of his life.
results.name: Back to the Future: The Game - Episode 4: Double Visions

results.deck: The fifth and final episode for Telltale Games' new Back to the Future adventure series.  Lives are changed, mysteries are solved, and paradoxes are avoided as young Emmett seals his fate, sending Marty and Doc on a climatic chase through Hill Valley's past, present, and future.
results.name: Back to the Future: The Game - Episode 5: OUTATIME

results.deck: Sony's MLB franchise returns for the 2011 baseball season, with PlayStation Move and 3D support.
results.name: MLB 11: The Show

results.deck: The fourth mainline game in the Earth Defense Force series.
results.name: Earth Defense Force 2025

results.deck: A kids game where you need buzzers. Has two releases, ps2 and psn
results.name: Buzz! Junior: Dino Den

results.deck: A Portuguese exclusive Singstar. It has some of the most famous Portuguese songs to date.
results.name: Singstar Portugal Hits

results.deck: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 12 features a new "Caddie Experience," and for the first time ever, The Masters at Augusta National Golf Club.
results.name: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 12: The Masters

results.deck: The 20th annual installment of EA Sports hockey, featuring the Winter Classic and an expanded physics engine.
results.name: NHL 12

results.deck: A HD re-release of Legend, Anniversary, and Underworld on the PS3.
results.name: The Tomb Raider Trilogy

results.deck: A nautical MMORPG set in the Age of Exploration.
results.name: Uncharted Waters Online

results.deck: Multiple snowy sports are represented in this wintery package.
results.name: Winter Sports 2011: Go for Gold

results.deck: Telltale Games continue on from the events of the first Jurassic Park film with this cinematic adventure game.
results.name: Jurassic Park

results.deck: Final Fantasy XIII-2 is a direct sequel to Final Fantasy XIII released by Square Enix in early 2012.
results.name: Final Fantasy XIII-2

results.deck: EA's long-running NFL series returns with its 2011 release, Madden NFL 12. It features Cleveland Browns running back Peyton Hillis on the cover, who won as a result of fan voting.
results.name: Madden NFL 12

results.deck: In a distant, chaotic future, cyborgs beat the crap out of each other in this multiplayer-heavy 3D beat 'em up from the developers of MadWorld and Bayonetta.
results.name: Anarchy Reigns

results.deck: Crash through buildings and takedown the opposition in Bugbear's very different take on Namco's Ridge Racer franchise.
results.name: Ridge Racer Unbounded

results.deck: The Cartel is the third game in Ubisoft's Call of Juarez franchise, this time in a modern setting.
results.name: Call of Juarez: The Cartel

results.deck: Spyro and friends are toys come to life in this new 3D platformer from Toys for Bob and Activision.
results.name: Skylanders: Spyro's Adventure

results.deck: Two dimensional fighting game by the developers of Melty Blood. UNiEL was released on the PlayStation 3 in Japan on July 24, 2014 by Arc System Works and on February 24, 2015 to North America by Aksys Games.
results.name: Under Night In-Birth

results.deck: The current WSC game being developed and published by Dark Energy Sports for PlayStation 3, Xbox 360 and PC, with a planned release during Q2 2011.
results.name: World Snooker Championship Real 2011

results.deck: Cars 2 is a mission based driving game, similar to Mario Kart.
results.name: Cars 2: The Video Game

results.deck: An installment in Frogwares' series of adventure games based on Arthur Conan Doyle's stories. The good detective begins acting very strangely, coming into conflict with the law and his long-time friend Dr. Watson.
results.name: The Testament of Sherlock Holmes

results.deck: AFL live is the 2011 videogame version of the most popular sport in Australia - Australian Rules Football. It is the first time that Big Ant studios has made a fully fledged AFL game and the first AFL game on this generation of systems.
results.name: AFL Live

results.deck: The official tie-in to the movie of the same name, Rio is a party game featuring a colourful cast of animal characters.
results.name: Rio

results.deck: A World war 2 game That tells the story of Schwarzenberg. A a Nazi stronghold full of plundered treasure and secret weapon projects.
results.name: Schwarzenberg

results.deck: The Transformers: War for Cybertron developers bring a movie-tie in game for Transformers: Dark of the Moon to home and portable consoles.
results.name: Transformers: Dark of the Moon

results.deck: Presenting an original story in the same franchise as the comic book series of the same name, The Walking Dead is a five-part adventure game from Telltale that follows the story of a convicted murderer, his guardianship over a young girl, and his co-operation with a roaming group of survivors in a zombie apocalypse.
results.name: The Walking Dead

results.deck: A prequel to the Fables comic book series, The Wolf Among Us tells a tale of the reformed Big Bad Wolf of childhood folklore (who is the sheriff of a secluded community of fables in 20th century New York City) as he investigates a series of grisly murders.
results.name: The Wolf Among Us

results.deck: A fitness game from UbiSoft that concentrates on Cardio, Balance, Upper Body Strength, Lower Body Strength, Core Strength, and Flexibility.
results.name: Fit in Six

results.deck: A 2D fighting game developed by FK Digital. It was released in the arcades in Japan in 2011 and on the PlayStation Network (PS3) in North America in September 2013.
results.name: Chaos Code

results.deck: This version of SingStar only features songs from Danish artists.
results.name: SingStar Danske Hits

results.deck:
Finally, a game that actually rewards you for shoving a Wii Remote down your pants.

We Dare is a (debatably) erotic minigame collection intended to enliven romantic relationships.
results.name: We Dare

results.deck: The 2009 edition of Konami's longrunning Nippon Professional Baseball simulation.
results.name: Pro Yakyuu Spirits 6

results.deck: The 2011 edition of the popular Nippon Professional Baseball league simulation. This year marks the series' first appearance on 3DS.
results.name: Pro Yakyuu Spirits 2011

results.deck: The fourth installment of the Mahjong Taikai series which sees you playing Mahjong with figures from Asian history.
results.name: Mahjong Taikai IV

results.deck: The 2007 edition of the popular Nippon Professional Baseball league simulation. This version marks the series' first appearance on the Playstation 3.
results.name: Pro Yakyuu Spirits 4

results.deck: The 2008 edition of the popular Nippon Professional Baseball league simulation.
results.name: Pro Yakyuu Spirits 5

results.deck: This is an updated version of Pro Yakyuu Spirits 5 released after the 2008 NPB season.
results.name: Pro Yakyuu Spirits 5 Kanzenban

results.deck: Bleach Soul Resurreccin is the first game in the Bleach franchise exclusively for the PlayStation 3. It was released June 23, 2011 in Japan and August 2, 2011 in North America and is based on the fourth Bleach movie titled Bleach: The Hell Verse.
results.name: Bleach Soul Resurreccin

results.deck: SoniComi (Sonico Communication) is a new visual novel game that based on Nitroplus mascot character, Sonico.
results.name: SoniComi

results.deck: A 2D fighting game by Aquaplus. It features characters from a variety of their existing franchises such as To Heart, Utawareru Mono and Tears to Tiara.
results.name: Aquapazza: Aquaplus Dream Match

results.deck: Motorcycles race each other for motorcycle supremacy in Capcom's latest motorcycle racing simulator.
results.name: MotoGP 10/11

results.deck: A 3DS game starring characters from a variety of Cartoon Network shows. A console version was released with additional characters and alternate costumes.
results.name: Cartoon Network: Punch Time Explosion

results.deck: Rocksmith is a guitar-based music game designed around playing a real electric guitar.
results.name: Rocksmith

results.deck: The annual college football release from EA Sports for the 2011-2012 season.  NCAA Football 12 will feature HDR rendering, Dynasty Mode improvements, custom playbooks and enhanced 3D field textures.
results.name: NCAA Football 12

results.deck: A racing game featuring 5-time Sprint Cup champion Jimmie Johnson, which (as the title suggests) lets you race anything with an engine. Even dumpsters.
results.name: Jimmie Johnson's Anything with an Engine

results.deck: The third entry in the Science Adventure series of visuals novels. Takes place in the near future and centers around high school students who attempt to build a real giant robot.
results.name: Robotics;Notes

results.deck: Race and destroy cars in this 3D destruction racing game from Left Field Productions.
results.name: Mayhem

results.deck: Undead Nightmare is a non-canon expansion pack to Red Dead Redemption that sees the main storyline get swept aside after the West becomes the setting for a zombie apocalypse, in which John Marston and his friends must fight for survival.
results.name: Red Dead Redemption: Undead Nightmare

results.deck: The final game of the Arland Alchemist trilogy and another entry in the long running Atelier franchise. Atelier Meruru revolves around Meruru's quest to develop the Arls Kingdom to match Arland's prestigious status with the use of alchemy.
results.name: Atelier Meruru: The Apprentice of Arland

results.deck: F1 2011 Is a the sequel to Codemasters first F1 game, F1 2010. It features updated teams and drivers as well as the new rules of the 2011 F1 season.
results.name: F1 2011

results.deck: A port compilation including HD versions of Resident Evil 4 and Resident Evil Code: Veronica.
results.name: Resident Evil Revival Selection

results.deck: In this multiplayer-focused shooter, set in the year 1998, the evil Umbrella Corporation and the U.S. Government clash in the hellish zombie-infested remains of Raccoon City in a battle for survival and control of the truth.
results.name: Resident Evil: Operation Raccoon City

results.deck: The spiritual sequel to "Spider-Man: Shattered Dimensions", Edge of Time has the player switching between Peter Parker, the Spider-Man of Today, and Miguel O'Hara, the Spider-Man of 2099, as they try to undo the circumstances that led Peter to his untimely death.
results.name: Spider-Man: Edge of Time

results.deck: A new Phineas and Ferb game based on the upcoming movie
results.name: Phineas and Ferb: Across the 2nd Dimension

results.deck: Sniper Elite V2 is a reboot to the tactical third person shooter Sniper Elite.
results.name: Sniper Elite V2

results.deck: A ground-up redesign of the original EyePet, this sequel will feature two EyePets simultaneously, along with expanded customization and socialization options.
results.name: EyePet & Friends

results.deck: An upcoming Rugby game for the 2011 New Zealand Rugby World Cup. It is being developed by HB Studios.
results.name: Rugby World Cup 2011

results.deck: Capcom makes an ambitious undertaking with this 2012 Open World Action-RPG.
results.name: Dragon's Dogma

results.deck: Frank West visits Fortune City in this "what if?" retelling of Dead Rising 2.
results.name: Dead Rising 2: Off the Record

results.deck: DanceDanceRevolution is Konami's 2011 console reboot of the DDR franchise.
results.name: DanceDanceRevolution

results.deck: The sequel to Hyperdimension Neptunia, the RPG starring a console-anthropomorphism who represents the Sega Neptune, accompanied by sidekicks representing the Xbox 360, Playstation 3, and Nintendo Wii.
results.name: Hyperdimension Neptunia mk2

results.deck: Old school and new school collide in this 20th Anniversary celebration of the Sonic franchise.
results.name: Sonic Generations

results.deck: FIFA 12 is set to be EA Sports' 2011 iteration of the franchise, covering the 2011-2012 season and will introduce tactical defending, precision dribbling and enhanced AI.
results.name: FIFA 12

results.deck: Terraria adds upon its inspiration with a wider variety of things to create, unique enchanted items, and an overall goal of descending into Hell and defeating the sinister bosses lurking there.
results.name: Terraria

results.deck: Need for Speed: The Run has drivers racing coast to coast across the USA, speeding through a variety of environments along the way.
results.name: Need for Speed: The Run

results.deck: Assassin's Creed: Revelations is the fourth installment in the Assassin's Creed franchise and the final entry in Ezio Auditore's main storyline. A few levels also put players back in control of the original Assassin's Creed's Altair, and depict his rise to the Mentorship of the Crusades-era Brotherhood of Assassins.
results.name: Assassin's Creed: Revelations

results.deck: Named after the movie but not based on it, Kung Fu Panda 2 sees unorthodox kung-fu master Po battling sinister reptiles who seek to destroy his home village.
results.name: Kung Fu Panda 2: The Video Game

results.deck: Black Bean Games' motorcycle racing game returns for another season.
results.name: SBK: Superbike World Championship 2011

results.deck: A third person shooter from Zoo Entertainment
results.name: Wanted Corp

results.deck: World War II strategy game in the Daisenryaku series.
results.name: Daisenryaku Daitoa Koboshi Dai Niji Sekai Taisen Boppatsu! Sujiku Gun Tai Rengo Gun Zen Sekai Sen

results.deck: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 brings World War 3 to the franchise, and furthers the exploits of Capt. Price and Soap MacTavish as they hunt down the international terrorist Vladimir Makarov.
results.name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3

results.deck: Set seventeen years after Soul Calibur IV, Soul Calibur V introduces a number of new characters to the roster and offers new gameplay tweaks and online enhancements.
results.name: Soulcalibur V

results.deck: Namco Bandai continues its Dragon Ball franchise with this 2011 release. Creating the most "true to the show" Dragon Ball Z game to date.
results.name: Dragon Ball Z: Ultimate Tenkaichi

results.deck: Lightbox Interactive is developing this spiritual successor to Warhawk for the PS3, incorporating the character-driven RTS gameplay in a style similar to The Outfit.
results.name: Starhawk

results.deck: Hasbro's popular mini-game collection series returns with this 4th iteration, which integrates motion controls and a new "game show" format inspired by the hit TV show of the same name.
results.name: Hasbro Family Game Night 4: The Game Show

results.deck: Pro Evolution Soccer 2012 is new version of very popular football simulation game from Konami.
results.name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2012

results.deck: This second installment concludes TT Games' LEGO-based take on the Harry Potter heptalogy, offering more of the standard LEGO smashing, building, and collecting mayhem.
results.name: LEGO Harry Potter: Years 5-7

results.deck: Dragon Age: Inquisition is the third installment in the Dragon Age series of role-playing games developed by BioWare.
results.name: Dragon Age: Inquisition

results.deck: Deadstorm Pirates is a light-gun game originally released in arcades which makes players have to man the helm throughout their adventure between bouts of shooting. While seating up to two players in front of the screen, the seats rock and shake as if you were in the high seas yourself.
results.name: Deadstorm Pirates

results.deck: Third game in the Trails in the Sky trilogy, part of the The Legend of Heroes franchise.
results.name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Sky the 3rd

results.deck: Disney Universe is an action adventure game where you wear costumes to defeat bad guys.
results.name: Disney Universe

results.deck: WWE '12 is the latest edition in WWE's long-running wrestling game franchise previously known as "SmackDown" and "SmackDown vs. RAW".
results.name: WWE '12

results.deck: The sequel to the underground hit Metro 2033. Set in Moscow in the year 2034, the player will be caught between warring factions vying for a doomsday device.
results.name: Metro: Last Light

results.deck: The third and final instalment in the UFC Undisputed franchise. This iteration sees the inclusion of PRIDE FC and the bantamweight and Featherweight divisions.
results.name: UFC Undisputed 3

results.deck: A compilation of several remastered Metal Gear titles: Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty, Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater, Metal Gear Solid: Peace Walker, plus hundreds of VR missions and both classic MSX2 Metal Gear games.
results.name: Metal Gear Solid HD Collection

results.deck: The second and third Silent Hill games come to the Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3 in Silent Hill HD Collection with new high-definition graphics and voice acting.
results.name: Silent Hill HD Collection

results.deck: A compilation of both PS2 Zone of the Enders games, with updated visuals, achievements and a new opening animation for the PS3 and Xbox 360.
results.name: Zone of the Enders HD Collection

results.deck: Pair up as Captain Kirk or Commander Spock in this co-operative based third-person shooter set after the events of the 2009 film.
results.name: Star Trek: The Video Game

results.deck: A winter sports game supporting Microsoft Kinect and Sony Move, developed by Deep Silver.
results.name: Winter Stars

results.deck: An extended version of Samurai Warriors 3 for the Playstation 3.
results.name: Sengoku Musou 3: Empires

results.deck: With the addition of cats and dogs for your Sims to love, The Sims 3 finally catches up to the state of the original game in 2002, when the The Sims: Unleashed expansion pack was released.
results.name: The Sims 3: Pets

results.deck: Defiance is a free-to-play MMO-shooter that coincides with events in a television series of the same name, depicting humans and aliens working together on a ravaged, mutated Earth. The game is multi-platform, but does not support cross-platform play.
results.name: Defiance

results.deck: The direct sequel to The Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Sky and the seventh entry in Falcom's Legend of Heroes series.
results.name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Sky SC

results.deck: Insomniac's first multiplatform game tells the story of OverStrike 9, a band of special-agent misfits working together to thwart a threat to mankind.
results.name: Fuse
